configuration.title: JetBrains Titlebar
command.applyGlow.title: Apply Titlebar Glow Effect
command.removeGlow.title: Remove Titlebar Glow Effect
command.manuallyRelocateCssPath.title: Manually Specify workbench.desktop.main.css Path
command.autoRelocateCssPath.title: Auto Detect workbench.desktop.main.css Path
configuration.glowIntensity.description: Glow effect glowIntensity as percentage (0-100), default 32
configuration.cssPath.description: Cached workbench workbench.desktop.main.css path, a homedir-csspath map object
configuration.glowDiameter.description: Glow diameter in pixels, > 80 recommended, default 260
configuration.glowOffsetX.description: Glow horizontal offset in pixels, default 120
